title: Champion Insights: Tahm Kench, the River King

replies.body:
Logged in to say great job Riot. You seem to have put a lot of thought and effort into this new champion. I cannot wait to see how he impacts the rift.
10/10
He's gonna be 'that broken new champ' so that everyone plays him and Rito knows how to nerf him, but I like the armoured carrier idea, time to make Kog'maw the FotM, big mouth bot-lane anyone?

The only reason riot releases champions strong at release is to see if the public knows what to do with them/against them. If the public are knowing what to do against him then that's good and they don't need to be changed

What happens if I eat an enemy Tahm Kench who has eaten a follow team member as the timer is running out for him? Do both enemies take damage if the opposing Tahm Kench dropped the other enemy in my mouth? Or will the other enemy fall out of my mouth when the timer runs out or perhaps when I eat the Tahm Kench initially? Lots of picky mechanics that would be good to know vsing other Tahm Kench's. One last thing, I'd love to lane with a Thresh then just jump to his shield and drop enemy under tower lmao that would be very strong.
Mirror Mode Tahm Kench: One Tahm with nine others inside him, like some sort of Russian Swamp Doll.
#Inception Nuff said
will qss get you out of his mouth?
mind blown xD
lol this fuking guy ate all my hungry jax burgers
You can't beat a flame grilled double bacon poro deluxe.
is it being sold at hungry jax?
Yes. with a free moustache.
already have one :/
ok i think im going to die
What if Tahm was to get killed while holding an ally champion?
they ALL DIE
hes is gonna be the most op support, more op than {{champion:432}}

how is bard op, most people i see are trash at him and literally only help the enemy teams with his ults. He is hard to be good at and pretty good i guess if your good at him. When ur bad at him, your someone everyone on your team hates, kinda like a teemo
Tahm can eat chogath with 6 stacks and {{item:2138}} ???
No his belly will pop
{{champion:432}} {{champion:34}} + This champ = Ultimate Troll team. But looking forward to a fun looking champ.
I see the future, he's going to broken just like ekko and nerfed the patch after :P
This guy on mirror mode.....
{{champion:89}} ? {{champion:37}} ? {{champion:16}} ? SCREW THEM WE HAVE TAHM FOR DINNER
What happens if theres 2 Tahm Kench, and one eats their adc, and then the enemies eats the first Tahm Kench while the first tahm kench has the adc eaten?

I think you did a great jog Riot. It looks like you put ALOT of thought and work into him ty for this amazing literally AMAZING hero <3 :D TY 
P.S {{item:3083}} {{item:3083}} all day long ;)
not the biggest fan of tanks but gj rito youve made another tank that will be etremely fun to play whether you like tanks or not, kinda like vlad xD
Cant wait to buy hiM
Nor can I!
This champion is a godsend to support players who are tired of reckless ADCs, I personally am gonna be playing this dude a lot and reckon he'll quickly become one of my favourite champions.
thresh is a thing.....
Nobody grabs the lantern.
y did u make a gromp champ
If Malph ulti Tahm Kench, the River King, while him consume a Team-Champ. will they Both Get the DMG?
too good
* 1. {{champion:238}} dad
PACMAN SKINNNNNNNN
I haven't been this excited for a new champ since {{champion:245}}
Fish Kirby.
Yes
Don't you hate it when Riot auto-corrects to Rito.. -.-
Tanks Riot, tanks for all the Tanks.
{{summoner:4}} {{item:1011}} {{champion:122}}
Tanks so much riot ;)

ill think this gonna work out greatly
cant w8 for tahm {{item:3083}}
HMMMM MANY THANKS RITO GOTTA LOVE NEW TANKS
yes, new awesome tankyness to my collection. THANKS RITO :D
XD i imagined a champ coming out like this but i imagined it to be a turtle that can hide them in his shell, this works well though devour fits nicely XD
This seems like it could be a relative of gromp. Everybody loved Gromp so they thought that putting a relative of Gromp into a champ would be a great idea. Good job rito.
